description:
POSITION PURPOSE/SUMMARY STATEMENT (defines the major functions/purpose of the position):

What we’re looking for is a Sr. Marketing Manager with the mindset and passion to solve problems, lead a team, and elevate the brand through insightful and outstanding Marketing execution.

Under the strategic direction of the Sr. Marketing Manager , the Brand Maarketing Manager will be responsible for leading the go-to-market and digital execution across all channels and markets. The position is responsible for developing seasonal launch plans, including advertising, digital brand marketing (ecomm, social media, mobile, content, emerging media), brand partnerships, events, and .com. These responsibilities are inclusive, but not limited to leading media planning, contract negotiations, launch initiatives, and working cross-functionally with team to influence and execute premium brand collaborations and public relations.

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

· Execution of seasonal and product launch go-to-market initiatives including both sell-in and sell through tools. Core responsibilities include digital/social, advertising, partnerships, events, and content strategy.

· Key stakeholder to the creative development & production of tools with the creative team – including briefing all GTM and Digital needs for brand assets/photoshoots/etc for seasonal campaigns, brand content needs, launch initiatives and ongoing programs/products.

· Leverage consumer insight as well as digital know-how to recommend brand building digital executions. Develop and implement strategy across multiple digital disciplines including social media, digital creative, content production, eCRM, mobile and emerging spaces. Partner with the Head of Marketing to drive content strategy & calendar based on consumer & digital insights. Collaborate with entire brand team and brand partners to collect and develop content to disseminate on social media, digital advertising, .com, wholesale ecomm sites and online partners/influencers.

· Concepts and assists in production (with support from creative group and outside agencies) to manage and execute delivery of brand content to deliver on the brand ‘storyteller’ promise.

· Collaborate with producer for .com to ensure the brand’s digital presence is consistent and correct across digital platforms with regard to web design, email campaigns and content. Lead team in development of content calendars for .com to create seamless integration of digital marketing and ecommerce.

· Leverages media partners, influencers, ambassadors, brand partners, etc. to collect and develop content to support our digital/PR/media syndication strategy.

· Manages programs through to delivery in market in partnership with Head of Marketing and Retail Marketing Manager

· Communicates and coordinates with internal stakeholders (product, sales, marketing, and design) to gather requirements and develop project plans for the digital and go to market campaigns.

· Manages multiple interdependent timelines and distributes ongoing documentation of project plans with cross functional teams.

· Integrated in strategic planning of seasonal campaigns and launch initiatives with Head of Marketing.

· Monitors best in class activities for adoption into the brand’s plan.

· Manages global campaign development in partnership with Brand Design and/or outside agencies.

· Budgetary management.

· Train and develop team members based on individual talents. As the team grows, support internal career path and development for full time employees.

SUPERVISORY RESPONSIBILITIES:

This role will manage various agencies and contractors. As the team grows, so will supervisory responsibilities.

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS:

Education/Experience:

· Bachelor’s degree with marketing focus preferred, or related work experience.

· 4-6 years marketing experience, preferably in footwear, apparel or related consumer goods industry

· Digital/Social marketing knowledge necessary

· Proven, successful track record in effective marketing and team management

· Must have the ability to work effectively in a management role across digital marketing disciplines

· Must have presentation, communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills

· Must be proficient in Microsoft Office – Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint

· Should have a positive, energetic working style

· Effective team player with experience managing direct reports, or agencies

Skills/Programs/Knowledge/Behavior:

· Proficient in Microsoft Applications

· Proven track record of fiscal responsibility and knowledge

· Proven track record of success

· Knowledgeable in current trends

· Innovative manager with people & processes

· Experience working effectively in complex global organizations and often working under the pressure of competing and sometimes conflicting priorities

· Ability to use independent judgment in performing all duties of the position

· Ability to travel domestically and abroad

· Ability to assist with event and promotional execution

· Strong written and verbal communication skills to professionally and effectively interact with team, colleagues and leadership

· High degree of integrity with the ability to handle confidential and sometimes highly sensitive matters in the appropriate manner

$42 - $44 an hour
